biography: Pasi, affectionately known in golfing circles as "Susi-Pasi", is a formidable competitor hailing from the esteemed Vuosaari Golf Helsinki. His presence on the course is marked by a quiet intensity, a strategic mind, and a relentless pursuit of excellence.

With two past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Pasi has already made a significant impact on the tournament, securing one coveted Hector Trophée victory. Although the Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, his sights are firmly set on future triumphs.

As he prepares for his third appearance at the Hector Trophée 2025, Pasi is eager to leverage his experience and skill. Competitors would be wise to keep a close watch on "Susi-Pasi", as he is a force to be reckoned with.
